project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV Files
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs data analysis on CSV files, focusing on calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for user-specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement CSV file reading and data extraction
Calculate the mean for specified numerical columns
Calculate the median for specified numerical columns
Calculate the mode for specified numerical columns
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure they function correctly
